subject: Not working box urgent
description_text:
Hi i belive the box is broken, i have tried multiple computers and this is
what i get from all.

conversations.body_text: Hi Arhaam Rahaman,  In the “Settings - Update” section, click “Manual Firmware Update,” then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder → and select the proxultra.sfu file to update. This firmware will disable the 4th axis.

Hi Thank you, its now worked.


On Thu, 3 Jul 2025 at 12:15 AM, support@simsonn.com
